versions.description: As an auditor, I want the system to verify my good standing status so that I can only purchase exams if I meet the membership and ethics requirements

acceptance_criteria.statement: System checks active APSCA membership status
System checks for any ethics violations on record
Auditor is blocked from purchasing if not in good standing
Clear error message displayed when not in good standing

failure_modes: Auditor with expired membership can purchase exam
Auditor with ethics violation can purchase exam
guarantees: Good standing check runs before any purchase attempt
Membership status is verified against current data

versions.description: As an auditor, I want eligibility checks to include renewal status so I can only purchase exams when my credentials are current

acceptance_criteria.statement: System verifies credential renewal status
Auditors in renewal grace period are flagged
Purchase is blocked when renewal is overdue

failure_modes: Auditor with expired credential can purchase exam
guarantees: Renewal status check runs before purchase attempt

versions.description: As an auditor, I want the system to check my exam progression so that I can only purchase the next exam in sequence after passing the previous one

acceptance_criteria.statement: Part 1 is available to all auditors in good standing
Part 2 requires Part 1 passed
Part 3 requires Part 2 passed
Passed exams cannot be re-purchased

failure_modes: Auditor can purchase Part 2 without passing Part 1
Auditor can re-purchase a passed exam
guarantees: Exam sequence is enforced strictly
Pass status is verified before showing available exams

versions.description: As an auditor, I want progression rules to account for retakes and exemptions so eligibility is accurate

acceptance_criteria.statement: Retake attempts are limited by policy
Exemptions bypass progression checks

failure_modes: Exempt auditor blocked from exam purchase
guarantees: Progression rules honor exemptions

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to be notified of any unpaid invoices so that I can clear them before purchasing new exam invoices

acceptance_criteria.statement: System checks for unpaid invoices of all types
Unpaid invoices block new exam purchases
List of unpaid invoices is displayed to auditor
Paid invoices for untaken exams do not block purchases

failure_modes: Auditor with unpaid invoice can purchase new exam
guarantees: All invoice types are checked
Only unpaid status blocks, not untaken status

versions.description: As an auditor, I want unpaid invoice checks to include renewal fees so I can clear all obligations

acceptance_criteria.statement: Renewal invoices are included in unpaid checks
Outstanding renewal fees block exam purchases

failure_modes: Auditor can purchase exam with unpaid renewal fee
guarantees: Unpaid renewal fees are treated as blocking

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to see a list of exams I am eligible to purchase so that I can select the one I want

acceptance_criteria.statement: Account page shows exam purchasing section
Only eligible exams are displayed as purchasable
Exam name, price, and attempt number are shown
Re-sit pricing is shown for failed exams

failure_modes: Ineligible exam is shown as purchasable
guarantees: Eligibility is checked before displaying exams
Pricing reflects first attempt vs re-sit

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to see pricing breakdowns and invoice previews before purchase

acceptance_criteria.statement: Exam cards include total price and tax
Invoice preview is available before purchase

failure_modes: Invoice preview shows incorrect pricing
guarantees: Pricing matches invoice system calculations

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to complete the purchase of an exam invoice so that I can register for the exam

acceptance_criteria.statement: Auditor can select an exam and click Purchase
Invoice is created in the invoice system
Re-sit designation is recorded for failed exams
Attempt count is incremented
Confirmation is displayed with invoice details

failure_modes: Invoice created without eligibility check
Re-sit not designated for failed exam retry
guarantees: Invoice is only created after all checks pass
Attempt history is accurately tracked

versions.description: As an auditor, I want a clear post-purchase confirmation so I know what to do next

acceptance_criteria.statement: Confirmation page shows invoice number
Confirmation includes next steps for scheduling

failure_modes: Confirmation page missing invoice number
guarantees: Confirmation displayed after invoice creation

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to submit required attestations so that I can complete credential renewal

acceptance_criteria.statement: Attestation checklist is displayed with required items
Submitted attestations are timestamped

failure_modes: Attestation submission not saved
guarantees: Attestations are stored with audit trail

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to upload supporting evidence for attestations when required

acceptance_criteria.statement: Evidence upload is required for flagged attestations
Uploaded evidence is linked to attestation

failure_modes: Required evidence not enforced
guarantees: Evidence requirement is enforced when flagged

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to review my renewal eligibility so that I understand any gaps

acceptance_criteria.statement: Eligibility status is displayed with clear explanations
Requirements needed for renewal are listed

failure_modes: Eligibility details not displayed
guarantees: Eligibility information is available on dashboard

versions.description: As an auditor, I want a renewal invoice generated so I can pay my renewal fee

acceptance_criteria.statement: Invoice is generated with correct pricing tier
Invoice reflects late penalties when applicable

failure_modes: Invoice pricing tier incorrect
guarantees: Invoice reflects configured pricing rules

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to log CPE activities so that my credits are tracked accurately

acceptance_criteria.statement: Auditor can add CPE activity with date and credit value
Activity list totals credits for the reporting period

failure_modes: CPE credits not totaled correctly
guarantees: Credits total equals sum of activities

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to bulk import CPE activities from provider transcripts

acceptance_criteria.statement: Auditor can upload CSV file with CPE activities
System validates imported activities against policy rules

failure_modes: Invalid CPE activities imported without validation
guarantees: All imported activities are validated before saving

versions.description: As an auditor, I want to view my CPE compliance status so I know if I'm meeting renewal requirements

acceptance_criteria.statement: Dashboard shows current reporting period progress
Compliance gaps are highlighted with clear explanations

failure_modes: Compliance status shows incorrect totals
guarantees: Compliance calculations match policy rules
